Text.Page:
I was jealous when my friends Rokdos and Viyor set sail for...

(bloodstained and illegible)

...abducted and dragged to the island. Then, Rokdos and Viyor ruthlessly...

(smeared and illegible)

...evil sacrificial ritual turned them all into slaves. They are not the guys I used to know anymore. They butchered our neighbors and our friends.

I escaped the massacre, but I don't know how long I'll last. But I had to leave this warn...

(page torn)
